featured.text: Upon the super typhoon warning, Nancy rushed to the supermarket—only to find the shelves almost ______ and the stock nearly gone.
They wrote letters to the tuna companies and supermarkets asking them to find a way to spare dolphins.

definition.zh_def: 大型自助式商店，提供各種食品和日用品。
definition.en_def: A large self-service store that sells a variety of food and household goods.
definition.example: I bought some groceries at the supermarket.
